title: This Ring camera hack helps me keep a close eye on my most dangerous tech
description: In one room I have a robot-controlled laser beam that can slice through most materials. And in another, I have a robot-controlled spinning wheel of death.

title: Why you need a batteryless jump starter (and how it works)
description: Unlike many jump starters on the market, this one doesn't need to be regularly charged. Here's how it works.

title: The self-care desk accessory you didn't know you needed
description: Staying hydrated is crucial for professionals who spend their days tied to a desk. Here's one tasty way to make it happen.
